member.name: T:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities
member.summary: Static class containing extension methods for array manipulation.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.IsEqualTo(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Test to see if two arrays are equal.
member.returns: true if and only if the two arrays are of the same size and each element is equal.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.AppendChecked(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Copy data into the destination array at the specified index. If there is insufficient space, the remaining data is silently discarded. The main use for this is for inside key derivation functions where the amount of key generated by the function may be greater than the amount needed.
member.returns: Offset of the next byte to be written.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.Duplicate(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Create a duplicate copy of a byte array. This allows the original data to be modified or disposed of.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.OrTruncated(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Conditional truncation of an output value. If the value Length is zero, returns the source array. Otherwise a new array is created and the first Length bits of the source array copied into it and the new array returned.
member.param: The truncation length, 0 for no truncation.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.AddSafe``2(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{``0,``1},``0,``1)
member.summary: Wrapper for the Dictionary Add method to signal success or failure by means of a boolean return value rather than throwing an error.
member.typeparam: The Value type, null values are pruned.
member.returns: True if a new entry was added, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.GetValue``2(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{``0,``1},``0,``1)
member.summary: Wrapper for the Dictionary TryGetValue method returning the found value as the function result instead of the success or failure.
member.param: The default value to return if nothing is found.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.GetValue``2(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{``0,``1},``0)
member.summary: Wrapper for the Dictionary TryGetValue method returning the found value as the function result instead of the success or failure.

member.summary: Wrapper for the Dictionary Add method to signal success or failure by means of a boolean return value rather than throwing an error.
member.typeparam: The Value type, null values are pruned.
member.returns: True if a new entry was added, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.Concatenate(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Concatenate the two arrays

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.SafeIndex``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Return element number from if it exists, otherwise the default for the list element type.
member.param: The list to extract from (may be null).
member.returns: The extracted element or null if either is null or is greater than the number of elements.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.ArrayUtilities.AddRangeSafe``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},System.Collections.Generic.List{``0})
member.summary: If the list is not null, append the entries to the list . Otherwise, do nothing.
member.typeparam: The type of the list entries.
member.param: The list of items to be added if not null.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.Assert.NotNull``1(``0,``0@)
member.summary: Syntactic sugar to allow compact tests on the return value of a function. Returns true is is not null, otherwise false. The value is set equal to the value of in either case.
member.returns: True if the value is not null, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.Assert.Expired``1(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},``0)
member.summary: Provides a means of optionally expiring a value specified by . If is not null and specifies a time value that is strictly less than the value of , the value null is returned. Otherwise the value is returned.
member.typeparam: The type to return and of .
member.param: The value to return if not expired.
member.returns: The value unless the parameter is not null and is strictly less than the current time in which case the value null is returned.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.Assert.CacheValue``1(``0,``0@)
member.summary: Cache and return a value. This is used to produce compact expression body methods for properties that are only evaluated the first time they are called.
member.typeparam: The type of data to be cached.
member.param: The store that the value is to be written to.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.Extension.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read using index pointers that are 64 bits.
member.param: An array of bytes. A maximum of count bytes are read from the current stream and stored in .
The byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.remarks: This routine does not currently implement 64 bit clean processing, it merely provides a single point through which such processing may introduced should it prove necessary.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.Extension.Write(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current CryptoStream and advances the current position within the stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: The stream to be written to.
An array of bytes. This method copies bytes from to the current stream.
The byte offset in at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
member.remarks: This routine does not currently implement 64 bit clean processing, it merely provides a single point through which such processing may introduced should it prove necessary.

member.summary: Write the entire contents of to

member.name: T:Goedel.Utilities.NamespaceDoc
member.summary:
The Goedel.Utilities namespace contains various utilities classes. These include
Methods of converting binary data to/from character strings using standard encodings.
Testing if a character is of a particular type.
Convenience routines to test various types of assertion and throw an exception using an exception factory method such as the ones created by Exceptional.

member.name: T:Goedel.Utilities.NumberSplit
member.summary: Utilities to split an integer value to byte chunks

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.NumberSplit.Maximum(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the lesser of and , thus ensuring that the returned value is equal to or smaller than the specified maximum.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.NumberSplit.Minimum(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the greater of and , thus ensuring that the returned value is equal to or greater than the specified minimum.

member.name: M:Goedel.Utilities.NumberSplit.GetLast(System.Array,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate the upper bound for an array index given a specified first position and length.
member.param: The array for which the index value will be calculated.
The first element to be read.
The maximum number of elements to be read. If less than zero, defaults to the size of the array.
member.returns: The upper bound, that is one higher than the last element to be read.
